info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 1:49AM MDT until July 08 at 2:15AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lake County in northwestern Montana... * Until 215 AM MDT. * At 148 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ronan, or 14 miles south of Polson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail and gusts to 40 mph along with very heavy rain . SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Polson, Ronan, Pablo, Turtle Lake, Allentown, Kicking Horse, Charlo, Fort Connah, Finley Point and Salmon Prairie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
